introduce.description: Projects are fundamental units for organizing R&D activities, workflows, and resources. They provide teams with centralized planning, tracking, reporting, and acceptance capabilities.

addProject.title: Add Project
addProject.text: Create the foundation for managing development and testing activities. Establish centralized planning, tracking, reporting, and acceptance workflows.

sprintAndPlan.title: Sprint & Plan
sprintAndPlan.text: Define responsibilities, timelines, goals, and acceptance criteria. Enable organized execution while ensuring software quality and reliability.

developAndTest.title: Development & Testing
developAndTest.text: Follow plans to conduct development and testing activities. Continuously track tasks, defects, requirements, user stories, and test items.

reportResults.title: Report Results
reportResults.text: Summarize R&D outcomes including progress, efficiency metrics, data assets, and test results to support successful project delivery.

list.permissionHint: Only admin, creator, and owner can modify or delete projects.
list.projectNotExists: Project does not exist or not joined

agile.features: Core Features: Scrum Framework • Incremental Delivery • User-Driven Requirements
agile.scenarios: Ideal for: Agile development teams requiring rapid sprint

general.features: Core Features: Work Breakdown • Progress Management • Dependency Visualization
general.scenarios: Ideal for: Traditional R&D teams with cross-departmental projects

testing.features: Core Features: Custom Test Plans • Multi-type Testing • Defect Tracking
testing.scenarios: Ideal for: QA teams managing specialized testing projects

form.projectNamePlaceholder: Enter a brief project name, maximum 100 characters
form.planTimeDescription: Time constraints help ensure projects are completed within agreed timeframes, which is crucial for meeting customer expectations and contractual obligations.
form.ownerDescription: By setting a project owner, responsibilities and authorities are clarified, better promoting project completion and progress control, such as: problem solving, progress advancement, team member collaboration, etc.
form.importExampleDescription: Import main business sample data for quickly familiarizing with AngusTester business and feature demonstration.
form.membersDescription: Define project participants. Project members will automatically be assigned data permissions under the project for convenient team collaboration.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Please enter detailed project objectives, scope, etc., maximum 2000 characters

introduce.description: Modules are used to define and organize relatively independent functional sets in software systems. Through modules, tasks and functional use cases can be divided, thereby improving maintainability.

messages.addModuleHint: Press Enter or lose focus to save added module, double-click existing module to enter edit mode
messages.noModules: You haven't added any modules yet

introduce.description: Version management helps teams precisely track task-to-software version relationships, supports flexible planning, and ensures focus on current version priorities. Visualize progress to quickly identify issues and treat versions as verifiable deliverables.

versionTracking.title: Version Identification and Tracking
versionTracking.description: Precisely identify which software version each task corresponds to, quickly locate feature implementations.

versionPlanning.title: Version Planning and Goal Orientation
versionPlanning.description: Flexibly plan version goals and centrally manage key tasks and test cases for current versions.

versionProgress.title: Version Progress Visualization
versionProgress.description: Intuitively display version workload and completion progress, quickly identify potential issues.

verifiableDeliverables.title: Verifiable Deliverables
verifiableDeliverables.description: Manage versions as deliverables, ensuring each version is valuable and verifiable.

messages.mergeWarning: Warning: Once versions are merged, they cannot be restored !
messages.changeStatusConfirm: Confirm to change version status to “{status}” ?

list.noVersions: You haven't added any versions yet,

edit.versionNamePlaceholder: Enter version name, maximum 40 characters, e.g.: v1.0
edit.descriptionPlaceholder: Please enter version description, maximum 200 characters

introduce.description: Data tags can facilitate classification of tasks, functional use cases, etc., improve search and management efficiency, and promote efficient team collaboration. Examples: boundary testing, business process testing, error handling, input validation, output validation, exception condition testing, security testing, compatibility testing, etc.

messages.addTagHint: Press Enter or lose focus to save added tag, double-click existing tag to enter edit mode.
messages.noTags: You haven't added any tags yet,

messages.maxResourceActivityHint: Only the latest {maxResource} activities are saved for each resource. Activities exceeding {maxResource} will be automatically deleted.
